title: Crustless courgette and veg quiche
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons vegetable oil', '200g chopped courgette', '100g chopped fresh mushrooms', '120g chopped onion', '120g chopped green pepper', '1 clove garlic, minced', '6 eggs, beaten', '2 tablespoons single cream', '2 tablespoons whole milk', '450g cream cheese, softened and diced', '225 shredded Cheddar cheese', '4 slices wholemeal bread, cubed', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper']
